item.title: [PI]Quest Tab Help?!?!?![PI]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

lol dint i already answer this??

but i used playerassistant.java

go there and search for

public void handleLoginText() {

you should see a list of teleports like minigame tele monster tele
but it uses the c.getpa().sendframe126(“text here”, line id);
i edited my whole music tab with this and only 1 thing on my quest tab
here is my players online thing. it is the second line in my quest tab

		c.getPA().sendFrame126("PLayers on: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ "", 29162);

anyway. i think that answers your question i hope it did haha.
idk if it will work for you but it worked for me so good luck

item.title: [PI]Quest Tab Help?!?!?![PI]
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

addText(29161, "Server Uptime", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29162, "24/7", "Read Players Online", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); addText(29163, "Players Online", 0xFF981F, false, true, 52, TDA, 2); addHoverText(29164, ""+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+" Players Online!", "Read Special Quest Journal", TDA, 0, 0xff0000, false, true, 150); You See My Code… I Want It To Look Like This

Server Uptime 2658 Minuets Players Online 53
Thats Kinda How I Want My Quest Tab To Look Like… This Is For PI Source So PI Codes Only Please! HELP ME PLEASE!
